column1: NB:A technical issue has led to a shortfall in reported E. coli bacteraemia numbers for Leeds Teaching Hospitals for the period January to March 2017. This issue has now been resolved and will be updated in future publications
Italicised figures indicate data from months that are likely to be subject to minor change or update in the future monthly publications.
Data cells with red numbers indicate that these figures have been amended since the previous monthly publication.

Acute Trust are highlighted in grey where they have  failed to sign off their data for three months or more. Failure to sign off may be indicative of missing data and/or a data quality issues. Further detail can be found on the caveats page.
